errors.message: Oops! Something went wrong. It seems that one or more parameters are missing or invalid. Please double-check your input and try again.

errors.description: test accounts not allowed in production
errors.message: Oops! It seems you're trying to use test cards in a production environment. Please use valid payment information for real transactions.
